definitions.definition: A twisting turning battle between two or more military aircraft , especially between fighters .
examples: The two bi-planes swirled around each other like angry wasps in a violent dogfight .

definitions.definition: A fight between dogs , especially as part of the blood sport of dogfighting .

main_definition: ( aviation , military ) A twisting turning battle between two or more military aircraft , especially between fighters .
secondary_definitions: A fight between dogs , especially as part of the blood sport of dogfighting .
